testcase.name: To verify buy functionality
testcase.system-out: Given I launch browser......................................................passed Then I enter url............................................................passed And I verify url is working fine or not.....................................passed When Popup displays just close..............................................passed Then put "fastrack watches for men" in the search box.......................passed And click on search button..................................................passed And set the price range from "500" to "2000"................................passed Then click on particular product............................................passed And click on buy now button.................................................passed Then Verify Login page functionality........................................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
